text: 2.27: Zo 14.26; 16.13; Hi 8.10-11; 1 Zo 2.20Gu nde kaŋgi, nde Krais han Fhe Bakɨme Ŋina Ŋaara ndigim, ana nde phorga ki. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde bigɨn the kakagirim, guma the buni tharir nde suaŋv nde khɨvɨrie? Fhuvara. Fhe Bakɨme Ŋina Ŋaar za mba bigir nde khɨvigi. Ana buni, nta guigira buni guari ma. Nta guiguigi buni fhuvara. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, Fhe Bakɨme Ŋina Ŋaar mba bigi nde khɨvim, nde nta zɨn ŋgɨp, nde guigira Krais phorgɨ havhargiri.
